text: Tokkel Maryam tet Rabbi Qaxmeqe oggoluh teetik oggoleeh Qaxmeqe maynubuh tet yeynebe maqaanel, Nabii Zakariyya tet dacriseeh tet caagidil Sooleeh tet yeynebeh, Nabii Zakariyya is Qibaada elle Abitta Qari teetil Culinnaanih waqdi tet xaqul Quusi (caxâ mixu) geya Maryamey tahim ankek litoo teetik iyye? Usuk Yallih xaquk yan Caxâ mixuuy, Diggah Yalli isih faxa mara Cisab maleh yarzuqhe kaak itte
